column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I have also tried their sweet brioche (I don't see this one anymore
column2: but it reminded me of a giant chouquette - something you only find in France)
column3: their Kugelhopf (a unique orange blossom confection that is a treat without being sinful)
column6: and a few iterations of their fruit croissants. The fruit croissants are my favorite - the lemon/blueberry version was a bit heavy for me
column7: but the strawberry/pistachio version is perfect. Please don't stop making these!
